name: ALLIGATOR Simulator PRO the Alligator Game for Hunting
name_original: ALLIGATOR Simulator PRO the Alligator Game for Hunting
description:
Are you a alligator hunter who loves to hunt for alligators? This alligator hunting strategy app allows you to plan your alligator hunts on your favorite hunting spots. This is the perfect app for planning an effective alligator hunting trip. The alligator hunt planner app allows you to build, create and experiment with alligator hunting strategies in advance of your alligator hunting trip.

Plan exactly where you will sit or stand, place trees and water and then place the decoys on the image in any layout you want.

FEATURES:

- Plan your alligator hunting strategy with your alligator hunting buddies in advance of your hunting trip

- Use multiple images such as hunter, trees to plan your perfect alligator hunting strategy

- Save the alligator hunting plans you create to your camera roll to try on your next alligator hunt

- Recreate your most effective alligator hunting setup to remember what worked for your next hunt, perfect for any alligator hunter

- If you own land or properties that are good for alligator hunting grab this app to prepare for your next alligator hunt

- Pair this app with the alligator calls app with alligator sounds that is linked inside this app that will help any alligator hunter improve their alligator hunting success

Download the Alligator Hunting Planner App and start planning for your next alligator hunting trip today!
